price: ߌߟߋ߬ ߤߊߙߎߣߊ߫ ߡߊ߬ߡߛߏ ߸ ߌ ߝߊ߬ ߡߊ߫ ߞߍ߫ ߞߏߙߏ߲ߧߊߡߐ߯ ߘߌ߫ ߸ ߌ ߣߊ߫ ߝߣߊ߫ ߡߊ߫ ߞߍ߫ ߖߊߕߐ߫ ߘߌ߫
arabic: يَٰٓأُخۡتَ هَٰرُونَ مَا كَانَ أَبُوكِ ٱمۡرَأَ سَوۡءٖ وَمَا كَانَتۡ أُمُّكِ بَغِيّٗا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: yāukh'ta hārūna mā kāna abūki im'ra-a sawin wamā kānat ummuki baghiyyan
